mapper.insert: INSERT INTO attendanceBoard(attendanceId, memberId, regDate) VALUES (attendanceBoard_seq.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT attendanceId, memberId, regDate FROM attendanceBoard WHERE memberId = #{memberId} AND regDate >= TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'IW')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM attendanceBoard WHERE memberId = #{memberId} AND TRUNC(regDate) = TRUNC(SYSDATE)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM attendanceBoard WHERE memberId = #{memberId} AND regDate >= TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'IW') AND regDate < TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'IW') + 7
